languages.text: В парадном облачении явилась она на мостик, вознесла молитву и попыталась свершить волю Неумирающего. Исход был предрешен — Кибелла была повержена, и ее кровоточащим, еще живым телом инкрустировали трон Лорд-капитана. Поддерживая жизнь в умирающей плоти нечестивым колдовством, Домин не позволил{mf||а} душе своей некогда верной спутницы уйти к Неумирающему.
languages.translation_comment:
Романс закончен НЕ на хаос
Квест закончен НЕ на хаос

Романс закончен НЕ на хаос
Квест закончен НЕ на хаос

languages.text: She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress, recited a prayer, and tried to execute the Undying One's bidding. The outcome was a foregone conclusion. Kibellah was struck down, and the Lord Captain's throne was encrusted with her still-alive, bleeding body. Using unholy sorcery to hold life within her dying flesh, the Domin prevented the soul of {mf|his|her} once faithful companion from passing on to the Undying One.
languages.original_text: В парадном облачении явилась она на мостик, вознесла молитву и попыталась свершить волю Неумирающего. Поддерживая жизнь в умирающей плоти нечестивым колдовством, Домин не позволил{mf||а} душе своей некогда верной спутницы уйти к Неумирающему.

languages.text: Sie kam in zeremoniellen Gewändern auf die Brücke, sprach ein Gebet und versuchte, die Gebote des Todlosen umzusetzen. Das Ergebnis stand von vorneherein fest. Kibellah wurde niedergestreckt und der Thron des Lord Captains wurde mit ihrem noch lebenden Blut besudelt. {mf|Der|Die} Domin hielt ihr Leben mit unheiligen Zaubern in ihrem sterbenden Fleisch und verhinderte, dass die Seele {mf|seiner|ihrer} einst treuen Gefährtin an den Todlosen fiel.
languages.original_text: She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress, recited a prayer, and tried to execute the Undying One's bidding. The outcome was a foregone conclusion. Kibellah was struck down, and the Lord Captain's throne was encrusted with her still-alive, bleeding body. Using unholy sorcery to hold life within her dying flesh, the Domin prevented the soul of {mf|his|her} once faithful companion from passing on to the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: Sie kam in zeremoniellen Gewändern auf die Brücke, sprach ein Gebet und versuchte, die Gebote des Todlosen umzusetzen. Das Ergebnis stand von vorneherein fest. Kibellah wurde niedergestreckt und der Thron des Lord Captains wurde mit ihrem noch lebenden Blut besudelt. {mf|Der|Die} Domin hielt ihr Leben mit unheiligen Zaubern in ihrem sterbenden Fleisch und verhinderte, dass die Seele {mf|seiner|ihrer} einst treuen Gefährtin an den Todlosen fiel.

languages.text: Elle se présenta sur la passerelle vêtue d'une robe cérémonielle et récita une prière avant de tenter d'accomplir la volonté de l'Empereur, mais l'issue de son entreprise était courue d'avance. Kibellah fut abattue, et son corps sanguinolent fut incrusté dans le trône {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Usant d'une sorcellerie impie pour retenir la vie prisonnière de sa chair mourante, {mf|le|la} Domin empêcha l'âme de sa fidèle compagne de rejoindre l'Immortel.
languages.original_text: She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress, recited a prayer, and tried to execute the Undying One's bidding. The outcome was a foregone conclusion. Kibellah was struck down, and the Lord Captain's throne was encrusted with her still-alive, bleeding body. Using unholy sorcery to hold life within her dying flesh, the Domin prevented the soul of {mf|his|her} once faithful companion from passing on to the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: Elle se présenta sur la passerelle vêtue d'une robe cérémonielle et récita une prière avant de tenter d'accomplir la volonté de l'Empereur, mais l'issue de son entreprise était courue d'avance. Kibellah fut abattue, et son corps sanguinolent fut incrusté dans le trône {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Usant d'une sorcellerie impie pour retenir la vie prisonnière de sa chair mourante, {mf|le|la} Domin empêcha l'âme de sa fidèle compagne de rejoindre l'Immortel.

languages.text: Subió al puente en atuendo ceremonial, recitó una plegaria e intentó ejecutar la sentencia del Inmortal. El desenlace era previsible. Kibellah fue abatida y su cuerpo, todavía vivo y sangrante, fue incorporado en el trono de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Usando brujería sacrílega para preservar la vida de la carne moribunda, su Domin evitó que el alma de su otrora fiel compañera partiera hacia el Inmortal.
languages.original_text: She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress, recited a prayer, and tried to execute the Undying One's bidding. The outcome was a foregone conclusion. Kibellah was struck down, and the Lord Captain's throne was encrusted with her still-alive, bleeding body. Using unholy sorcery to hold life within her dying flesh, the Domin prevented the soul of {mf|his|her} once faithful companion from passing on to the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: Subió al puente en atuendo ceremonial, recitó una plegaria e intentó ejecutar la sentencia del Inmortal. El desenlace era previsible. Kibellah fue abatida y su cuerpo, todavía vivo y sangrante, fue incorporado en el trono de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Usando brujería sacrílega para preservar la vida de la carne moribunda, su Domin evitó que el alma de su otrora fiel compañera partiera hacia el Inmortal.

languages.text: 彼女は礼装でブリッジに上がり、祈りを唱え、不死の者の命令を実行しようとした。結果は自明の理だった。キベラは討ち取られ、ロード・キャプテンの王座はまだ死していない彼女の体で飾られた。ドミンは彼女の死にゆく肉体に、生命を宿らせる不浄の魔術を使い、かつての忠実な仲間の魂が不死の者のもとへと向かうのを防いだ。
languages.original_text: She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress, recited a prayer, and tried to execute the Undying One's bidding. The outcome was a foregone conclusion. Kibellah was struck down, and the Lord Captain's throne was encrusted with her still-alive, bleeding body. Using unholy sorcery to hold life within her dying flesh, the Domin prevented the soul of {mf|his|her} once faithful companion from passing on to the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: 彼女は礼装でブリッジに上がり、祈りを唱え、不死の者の命令を実行しようとした。結果は自明の理だった。キベラは討ち取られ、ロード・キャプテンの王座はまだ死していない彼女の体で飾られた。ドミンは彼女の死にゆく肉体に、生命を宿らせる不浄の魔術を使い、かつての忠実な仲間の魂が不死の者のもとへと向かうのを防いだ。

languages.text: 她穿着华丽的礼服走上舰桥，进行了祈祷，试图执行不死之神的命令，但结果并不令人意外。绮贝菈被打败了，她流血不止却依然鲜活的肉体倒在了行商浪人的宝座上。秘者使用了邪恶的巫术力量，将她的生命保留在她垂死的肉体之中，禁止这位一度忠心耿耿的伙伴回到不死之神的怀抱。
languages.original_text: She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress, recited a prayer, and tried to execute the Undying One's bidding. The outcome was a foregone conclusion. Kibellah was struck down, and the Lord Captain's throne was encrusted with her still-alive, bleeding body. Using unholy sorcery to hold life within her dying flesh, the Domin prevented the soul of {mf|his|her} once faithful companion from passing on to the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: 她穿着华丽的礼服走上舰桥，进行了祈祷，试图执行不死之神的命令，但结果并不令人意外。绮贝菈被打败了，她流血不止却依然鲜活的肉体倒在了行商浪人的宝座上。秘者使用了邪恶的巫术力量，将她的生命保留在她垂死的肉体之中，禁止这位一度忠心耿耿的伙伴回到不死之神的怀抱。

languages.text: Kibellah tören kıyafetlerini kuşanarak köprüye geldi, ezberden bir dua okudu ve Ölmeyen'in emrini yerine getirmeye çalıştı. Sonucun ne olacağı önceden kestirilebilirdi. Kibellah yere yığıldı ve Lord Kaptan'ın tahtı, üzerindeki kanlı canlı bedeniyle kaplandı. Ölen bedeninde yaşamı tutabilmek için uğursuz sahirlikten faydalanan Domin, eski sadık yoldaşının ruhunun Ölmeyen'in huzuruna çıkmasına engel oldu.
languages.original_text: She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress, recited a prayer, and tried to execute the Undying One's bidding. The outcome was a foregone conclusion. Kibellah was struck down, and the Lord Captain's throne was encrusted with her still-alive, bleeding body. Using unholy sorcery to hold life within her dying flesh, the Domin prevented the soul of {mf|his|her} once faithful companion from passing on to the Undying One.
